name: Space Invadards
description: The world probably does not need yet another not-quite-as-good-as-the-original Space Invaders imitation. However,  I needed a little project to get my grey matter moving. I did a couple of Godot tutorials on youtube, but what really helps me learn is to make something myself. I found a brief and rather incomplete demo/tutorial for a space invaders game, so I started with that and ran with it to make Space Invadards, which you are now playing, or about to play, or about to close this window and go play outside instead.
